email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280m. The laycan is October 15-20. Our starting freight quote is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider something in the high 40s, say $49.50 per metric ton? Also, can you confirm the laytime and demurrage terms? Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your position, but $49.50 is a bit tight given current market conditions. How about we meet in the middle at $50.25 per metric ton? Laytime is 72 hours total, and demurrage is set at $20,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. $50.25 is acceptable, provided the laycan remains firm at October 15-20. Can you confirm the vessel’s availability and send over the draft charter party for review? Also, can we cap demurrage at $18,000 per day? Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that $50.25 works for you. I’ve confirmed the MV Ocean Star’s availability for the laycan, and I’ll send over the draft charter party shortly. Regarding demurrage, we can agree to cap it at $18,000 per day. I’ll include this in the charter party. Let me know if there’s anything else you need. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the confirmation. I’ve reviewed the draft charter party, and everything looks in order. Let’s proceed with the agreement at $50.25 per metric ton, laycan October 15-20, and demurrage capped at $18,000 per day. Please finalize the paperwork, and we’ll sign off. Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, excellent! I’ll finalize the charter party and send it over for your signature. Thanks for your cooperation, and I look forward to working with you on this shipment. Let me know if you need anything else. Best regards, Sarah.
